column4: How can I make my many-buttoned mouse's extra buttons work in a game such as Enemey Territory?
you may have to map the mouse buttons to keys and then bind the keys under ET
as to how to map them to keys, i have no idea but theres a logitec hguide
woops, sorry, didn't mean to PM, xtknight
I don't know why it doesn't work
I think the game gets its input differently than, say, my desktop
um so when you press one of the extra keys at the desktop in a text box what happens
yet when u bind it in ET it doesn't work?
it doesn't bind it to anything
ET doesn't think any button's been pushed
odd.  what happens if you pull down the console in ET and then pres it
At any rate, I don't want those mouse buttons bound to keys when I'm not in the gam
and ET won't sense modifier+key combinations
yeah, well i have no clue.  you could map the buttons to something beyond ASCII
